title.rendered: Youth We Can! Festival: call for participation!

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section admin_label=”Section” fullwidth=”on” specialty=”off”][et_pb_fullwidth_slider admin_label=”Curseur de défilement plein écran” show_arrows=”on” show_pagination=”on” auto=”off” auto_ignore_hover=”off” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off” remove_inner_shadow=”off” background_position=”default” background_size=”default” hide_content_on_mobile=”off” hide_cta_on_mobile=”off” show_image_video_mobile=”off” custom_button=”off” button_letter_spacing=”0″ button_use_icon=”default” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″] [et_pb_slide button_text=”Appel à contributions !” button_link=”https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdYn-u1ETbpmwb3Tsxez7GBB_T2m20Eo9AD2Ppu2QO6EVL1Qg/viewform” background_image=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/Affiche-V2.jpg” background_position=”default” background_size=”default” background_color=”#ffffff” use_bg_overlay=”off” use_text_overlay=”off” alignment=”center” background_layout=”dark” allow_player_pause=”off” text_border_radius=”3″ header_font_select=”default” header_font=”||||” body_font_select=”default” body_font=”||||” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#313f55″ button_border_color=”#313f55″ button_font_select=”default” button_font=”||||” button_use_icon=”default” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on”] [/et_pb_slide] [/et_pb_fullwidth_slider][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”section”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

The first edition of the Youth We Can! (YWC!) Festival will take place on September 23rd 2017, at the Parc de la Villette, in Paris.  

Co-organized by l’Avise and Convergences, with the support of the Youth We Can! Collective, this event offers organizations focused on youth and commitment to benefit from a free booth to organize activities and showcase their missions.

The Youth We Can! Festival: what is it?
Designed as an initiatory trip towards commitment, the Festival offers a platform of exchanges and aims at inspiring young people wanting to undertake a project with societal impact. In a festive and environmentally responsible atmosphere, the Youth We Can! Festival wishes to raise awareness among youth through dynamic and innovative activities and workshops.

Which conditions to participate in?
1. To suggest playful, interactive and participatory activities in order to create the click and raise awareness on new alternative models and citizen commitment.
2. To install and dismantle your workshop/booth according to the period previously indicated by YWC! and the Parc de la Villette (kakémonos, material, etc.)

Who communicates?
– Festival contributors will appear on the Youth We Can! Festival programme. Your logo will be requested.
– Festival contributors commit to communicate on their participation to the Youth We Can! Festival 2017 using the dedicated communication toolkit.

When and where?
– Date: Saturday September 23rd 2017, from 11:00am to 06:00pm.
– Location: La Folie des Merveilles at La Villette, Paris.

You can contribute to the Festival by suggesting workshops, activities or booths.
In order to do so, please fill the form before Wednesday May 10th 2017. The Youth We Can! Team will get back to you before May 20th.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button admin_label=”Bouton” button_url=”https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdYn-u1ETbpmwb3Tsxez7GBB_T2m20Eo9AD2Ppu2QO6EVL1Qg/viewform” url_new_window=”off” button_text=”Fill the form!” button_alignment=”center” background_layout=”light” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#313f55″ button_letter_spacing=”0″ button_use_icon=”default” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″] [/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
